GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.63
GSD.description:
fs/ntfs3: Fix NULL deref in ntfs_update_mftmirr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit 8e8e1a84dac7a3d2b432162a70d7fb6a75960772, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 82cae269cfa953032fbb8980a7d554d60fb00b17. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: fs/ntfs3: Fix NULL deref in ntfs_update_mftmirr
